name: Bottomless Potion of Mutilation
flavorText: "Well, I had to test it on someone, didn't I? You're all just jealous!" -Royal Apothecary Jentulf at his trial, just before sentencing.
flavorTextHtml: "Well, I had to test it on someone, didn't I? You're all just jealous!" -Royal Apothecary Jentulf at his trial, just before sentencing.
